text:
@realDonaldTrump Ssoooo.... I will be told how much my COVID-19 care & treatment will cost before the wheel me into the ICU... Geeeezy Peeeezy Thanks!
Its good to know that I will know about the hundreds of thousands of dollars of debt my beloved will have to suffer under just before I die!
